description:
The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook`s story about a promise he made to a very special whale!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Man`s Promise Never Dies!! To the Friend Waiting Under the Distant Sky!
La promesse d’un homme ne meurt jamais ! Pour toi, mon ami qui m’attends au loin
Otoko no Chikai wa Shinazu!! Tooi Sora de Matsu Tomo e
Мужское обещание не умирает! Другу, ждущему в отдалённом небе!
男の誓いは死なず!! 遠い空で待つ友へ
